name: Angry Ducks
description:
Help! Hordes of angry rubber ducks escaped from the factory! They want to invade our ponds, lakes and swamps! They must be stopped! Rubber ducks of the same color will disappear if you place them in rows.

Enjoy two game modes:
• Story mode: Save the lake dwellers from the rubber horror! Levels will become harder and harder, but you will make it!
• Endless mode: Play as long as you like!

Excellent game for all ages! Great graphics and easy to use controls!

You can remove commercial ads in game with in-app purchase.
